channel.title: Gfx list
channel.description:
to the staff: if this is wrong section, i'm sorry but idk where to post it.
okay since i heard loads of players don't got a gfx list i uploaded one.
Credits: i don't know who made it so.. credits to him i don't take credits cause i just use it, i don't made it.
download here: uppit: http://uppit.com/v/XXN66TV1 mediafire: http://www.mediafire.com/?oznmggnzggm
the list in code tags:

item.title: Gfx list
item.dc:creator: @mod_p mod p
item.description:
@mod_p wrote:

to the staff: if this is wrong section, i’m sorry but idk where to post it.

okay since i heard loads of players don’t got a gfx list i uploaded one.
